title: Skinspotlights Creator Suit Rebinding Hotkeys
body:
Hey,
I would love to use the Creator Suit by Skinspotlights, but unfortunately my new keyboard has no numpad (worked with the old one).
I have already tried the official tutorial (https://www.reddit.com/r/CreatorSuite/comments/48zb5s/rebinding_the_fps_camera_advanced/) 
but it doesnt work for me.
Has someone had the same problem once and could help me out ?
Thanks for further replies {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Since we don't develop this software, I won't be able to assist you with troubleshooting the issues you're having with it. I recommend reaching out directly to the developer or on the [**CreatorSuite Subreddit**](https://www.reddit.com/r/CreatorSuite/).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
